page.title: 05County Primary School
page.content: Yealmpton Primary School is a mixed non-denominational one for children 5-11 years old.It is on a split site - infants and juniors being seperate. It is a family school which aims to achieve high academic and sporting standards. There are numerous clubs and activities, two swimming pools, a wind band, recorder and guitar ensembles and two football and netball pitches.There are over 200 children in 7 classes. Secondary education is provided at Ivybridge Community College and children are collected by bus daily from a number of points in the village.{The Staff comprise; {Headmaster }Mr D.J.Breeze,{ Deputy Mrs A.Bunting,{and 7 Staff }Mrs E.Breeze, Mr R.Christmas, Miss N.Hobbs Mrs S.Mealing, Mrs J.Milner, Mrs B.Fellows. A village playgroup meets daily in the Methodist Church Hall.
